mapper.select: SELECT vb.value as orderValue, vtl.meaning as orderMeaning FROM sys_code_value_b AS vb LEFT JOIN sys_code_value_tl AS vtl ON vb.code_value_id=vtl.code_value_id LEFT JOIN sys_code_b AS cb ON vb.code_id=cb.code_id WHERE cb.code='HAP_OM_ORDER_STATUS' and vtl.lang = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
